'''Minecraft Ten''' is a [[font]] {{in|be}}, based on the game's logo. It is used in some headings and UI texts when emphasis is needed.

== Definition ==
; {{mono|minecraft-ten.ttf}}

A TrueType font, named "Minecraft Ten". Metadata indicates it was made by [https://www.canadatype.com/ Canada Type] in 2018. Likely to be a commission from Mojang, as Canada Type does not list it for purchase/licensing on their website.

== Downloads ==
The version of this font used on the website can be downloaded from minecraft.net [https://www.minecraft.net/etc.clientlibs/minecraftnet/clientlibs/clientlib-site/resources/fonts/MinecraftTen.woff here].
